General.Name: Dali Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Dali Pharmaceuticalco.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells pharmaceutical products in China. It develops Chinese and Western medicine injection. The company's products include xingnaojing, shenmai, and astragalus injections, as well as citicoline injections. It also has patents, including invention patents and utility models. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Dali, China.
General.Address: No. 118, West Huancheng Road, Dali, China, 671000
